name: isHome
description: Set to true if header is on the homepage (logo will appear in at "h1" tag), else set to false (logo will appear in a "div" tag).

name: assetsPath
description: The public path for the assets folder. If not provided it defaults to /assets/images. You need to put the .png version of the logo in this folder, along with any other images from the pattern library that you're using. You can find them here: https://github.com/LBHackney-IT/LBH-frontend/tree/master/package/lbh/assets/images. If in doubt just copy that entire folder.

name: homepageUrl
description: URL logo will link to (defaults to '/').

name: serviceName
description: Service name to appear after Hackney logo to describe website. Must be short.

name: isServiceNameShort
description: If set to true service name will be capitalised and in larger font.

name: links
description: HTML content for the right hand side of the header, will stack on mobile.

name: colourScheme
description: Name of colour scheme to use instead of default black background, current options are `red` or `purple`.

name: isStackedOnMobile
description: If set to true this will stack the right hand side html content of the links field underneath the logo rather than alongside on mobile. If this option is true then isFixed should be false (or the margin-top of `.lbh-header--fixed + *` will need updating on mobile to match the height of your header).

name: isFixed
description: If set to true header will be fixed to the top of the window on scroll.
